snippet.title: Portal 2 - Aperture Tag Trailer
snippet.description:
The trailer for Aperture Tag; a new Portal game developed by a dedicated team of fans. 

Steam page:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/280740/

Get the soundtrack!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fSLvAL4vG4Y

-----

Lead Director | Level Design | Map Creation
Eugenio 'Motanum' Roman Mota

Trailer | Animation | Music
Harry 'Harry101UK' Callaghan

Custom Models
August 'Rantis' Loolam
dustpup_jr
JorisCeoen

Special Thanks To:
Benjamin Blodgett
Valve
